name: node-kafka-rest
description: kafka consumer & producer via HTTP REST

scripts.kafka:rick: yarn kafka:stop && yarn kafka:build && yarn kafka:start && yarn kafka:generate-data && yarn kafka:log
scripts.kafka:generate-data: while IFS= read line; do echo "echo '$line' | kafka-console-producer.sh --topic=test --broker-list=localhost:9092 --property='parse.key=true' --property='key.separator=#' " | docker exec -i kafkasetup_kafka_1 bash -; done< ./kafka-setup/test-data.txt
scripts.test: npm run lint && istanbul cover _mocha -- -R spec test/int/* && istanbul check-coverage --statements 50

author: Chris Froehlingsdorf <chris@5cf.de>
